relevant_findings.general: Cooperative, anxious, and disheveled. Excorications on face, arms, and legs, mid-back spared. Fully oriented.
relevant_findings.mental_status: Irritable and somewhat hostile toward a female interviewer; pleasant and cooperative with a male interviewer. Conviction of parasitic infestation and thought processes were perseverative and occasionally tangential.

relevant_findings.skin: Neurologic excoriations, erosions, ulceration, and scarring due to compulsive picking at skin.
Excoriations have improved but not completely resolved.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial concerns about parasitic infection no longer expressed; overall improvement in skin excoriations noted.
